metadata.name: Getting Started
metadata.description: Essential guides to help you master Build OS fundamentals

daily-brief-guide.title: Using Daily Briefs Effectively: Your Personal Intelligence System
daily-brief-guide.description: Make the most of your daily AI-generated briefs—contextual intelligence that draws from your goals, plans, tasks, and documents to provide personalized strategic guidance.
daily-brief-guide.author: DJ Wayne
daily-brief-guide.excerpt: Transform your daily productivity with AI-powered briefs that draw from your full context—goals, plans, tasks, and documents—to provide personalized strategic intelligence.

effective-brain-dumping.title: Brain Dumping That Actually Works: From Chaos to Compounding Context
effective-brain-dumping.description: Your brain dump doesn't have to become another abandoned note. Here's how Build OS transforms scattered thoughts into goals, plans, and tasks that actually connect.
effective-brain-dumping.author: DJ Wayne
effective-brain-dumping.excerpt: Your brain dump doesn't have to become another abandoned note. Here's how Build OS transforms scattered thoughts into goals, plans, and tasks that actually connect.

first-project-setup.title: Creating Your First Project in BuildOS: Just Start Talking
first-project-setup.description: Learn how to create your first project in BuildOS by simply having a conversation. No forms, no templates, just tell BuildOS what you want to build.
first-project-setup.author: DJ Wayne
first-project-setup.excerpt: Create your first project in BuildOS by having a natural conversation. Tell it what you want to build, answer a question or two, and watch your project take shape.

how-buildos-works.title: How BuildOS Works
how-buildos-works.description: I hated repeating myself in different chats. I wanted to build context on my projects that AI could actually use. That is why I built BuildOS.
how-buildos-works.author: DJ Wayne
how-buildos-works.excerpt: I hated repeating myself in different chats. I wanted to build context on my projects that compounds over time. That is why I built BuildOS.

under-the-hood.title: Under the Hood: How BuildOS Organizes Your Thoughts
under-the-hood.description: A peek behind the curtain at the ontology that powers BuildOS—rich context architecture where goals, milestones, plans, tasks, and documents all connect.
under-the-hood.author: DJ Wayne
under-the-hood.excerpt: Most productivity tools force you into rigid templates. BuildOS takes a different approach—a connected ontology where goals, milestones, plans, tasks, and documents form rich context that compounds over time.

understanding-life-goals.title: Goals vs Projects: Why Most Productivity Systems Get This Wrong
understanding-life-goals.description: Learn how goals sit at the top of Build OS ontology—connecting to plans, tasks, and documents. Discover how strategic alignment becomes automatic when context is structured.
understanding-life-goals.author: DJ Wayne
understanding-life-goals.excerpt: Master how goals connect to plans, tasks, and documents in Build OS rich context architecture. When your context is structured, strategic alignment becomes automatic.

who-is-buildos-for.title: Who is BuildOS For?
who-is-buildos-for.description: A comprehensive (and increasingly unhinged) list of everyone who could use BuildOS. Spoiler: probably you.
who-is-buildos-for.author: DJ Wayne
who-is-buildos-for.excerpt: Founders, freelancers, overthinkers, underthinkers, people who make lists about making lists. If you have thoughts and want them organized, this is for you.

metadata.name: Philosophy
metadata.description: Our vision for the future of personal productivity

agentic-vrs-context-engineering.title: Why Context Engineering Will Matter More Than Agentic Engineering
agentic-vrs-context-engineering.description: As AI agents gain more capabilities, the real differentiator becomes context engineering: the art of providing the right knowledge at the right time. See how Project Lens puts this into practice.
agentic-vrs-context-engineering.author: DJ Wayne
agentic-vrs-context-engineering.excerpt: While everyone focuses on giving AI agents more capabilities, the real edge comes from context engineering: teaching AI judgment through curated, relevant, evolving information. Discover why contextual precision beats raw capability.

anti-ai-assistant-execution-engine.title: Build OS: The Anti-AI-Assistant That Actually Helps You Ship
anti-ai-assistant-execution-engine.description: Why Build OS refuses to do everything for you, and why that makes it work. How context engineering beats autonomous agents for actually shipping products.
anti-ai-assistant-execution-engine.author: DJ Wayne
anti-ai-assistant-execution-engine.excerpt: Everyone races to build AI that does everything for you. Build OS takes the opposite approach: AI that helps you see clearly so you can do what matters. Clarity beats automation for actually shipping products.

compound-engineering-for-your-life.title: Compound Engineering for Your Life: Why Every Brain Dump Makes You Smarter
compound-engineering-for-your-life.description: Software engineers discovered that AI gets permanently smarter from every code review and bug fix. BuildOS applies the same principle to your life — brain dumps, daily briefs, and Project Lens all compound over time.
compound-engineering-for-your-life.author: DJ Wayne
compound-engineering-for-your-life.excerpt: Software engineers discovered that AI gets permanently smarter from every code review and bug fix. BuildOS applies the same principle to your life — brain dumps, daily briefs, and Project Lens all compound over time.
